sub_topic: Prove that the empty set is a subset of every set.
message_1: Let set A = {1, 2, 3}. Is the empty set a subset of set A? If yes, write the subset; if no, explain why.
message_2: Yes, the empty set is a subset of set A. The empty set, denoted as ∅ or {}, is a subset of every set, including set A. So, the subset is {} or ∅.
